import java.util.Scanner;

public class ques11 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method 
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
	String s="y";
		String m1="card";
		double total=0;
		String m;
		System.out.println("how would u like to make the paayment cash or card ?");
		 m=sc.next();
		double finaltotal=0;
			
			double discount;
			for(;s.equals("y");)
			{
			System.out.println("enter item code,description,quantity,price");
			int n1=sc.nextInt();
			String d=sc.next();
			int q=sc.nextInt();
			int p=sc.nextInt();
			System.out.println("do u wish to add some more products yes or no");
			 s=sc.next();
			total=total+(p*q);
		    }
			if(total>=10000)
				
			{
				discount=(total/100)*10;
				finaltotal=total-discount;
				
			}
			
			else if(total<=1000 && m.equals(m1))
				{
				double charges=total*0.25;
				finaltotal=total+charges;
				}
			else
				finaltotal=total;
			
		
			System.out.println("finaltotal is " +" Rs" +finaltotal );
		}
			
	
		

	}
